```{r "initialize", echo=FALSE, result=FALSE, warning=FALSE, cache=FALSE, include=FALSE}
#setwd("A5-DataAndMetadataUpload")
rm(list = ls())

source("../include/DBSetup.R")
source("../include/functions.R")
figName <- "A5DAMU-1"
opts_chunk$set(
  fig.path = paste0("figure/", figName)
  , fig.width = 13
  , fig.height = 7
  , cache = FALSE
  , echo=FALSE
  )


library(plyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(lubridate)
library(xtable)

dbConnection <- with(db.sqlite.cfg, dbConnect(driver, dbname = fName))

tmpDbResource     <- dbSendQuery(dbConnection, db.sqlite.cfg$query$param2011List)
tmpParam2011_wdf <- fetchResults(tmpDbResource)
tmpParam2011_wdf$year <- 2011
tmpDbResource     <- dbSendQuery(dbConnection, db.sqlite.cfg$query$param2012List)
tmpParam2012_wdf <- fetchResults(tmpDbResource)
tmpParam2012_wdf$year <- 2012
param_wdf <- rbind(tmpParam2011_wdf, tmpParam2012_wdf)

param_wdf <- within(param_wdf, {
  uploadedDate  <- ifelse(uploadedDate == 0, NA, yday(unix2POSIXct(uploadedDate)))
  metadatedDate <- ifelse(metadatedDate == 0, NA, yday(unix2POSIXct(metadatedDate)))
})

rm(tmpParam2011_wdf, tmpParam2012_wdf)

# Elimino tutte le righe con entrambi NA alla data di metadata e di upload
param_wdf <- param_wdf[rowSums(is.na(param_wdf[,3:4])) < 2,]

paramAggr_wdf <- ddply(
  param_wdf
  , .(metadatedDate, uploadedDate, domainName, year, countryName)
  , summarize
  , parameterNum = length(domainName)
)

paramAggr_df <- reshape(
  paramAggr_wdf
  , direction = "long"
  , varying = 1:2
  , times = colnames(paramAggr_wdf)[1:2]
  , v.names = "dayOfYear"
  , idvar = colnames(paramAggr_wdf)[3:5]
  , timevar = "action"
)
paramAggr_df <- paramAggr_df[complete.cases(paramAggr_df),]
row.names(paramAggr_df) <- NULL
```

```{r "siteNumbers"}
tmpDbResource <- dbSendQuery(dbConnection, db.sqlite.cfg$query$siteNumber)
siteNumber    <- fetchResults(tmpDbResource)[[1]]
tmpDbResource <- dbSendQuery(dbConnection, db.sqlite.cfg$query$stationNumber)
stationNumber <- fetchResults(tmpDbResource)[[1]]
tmpDbResource <- dbSendQuery(dbConnection, db.sqlite.cfg$query$param2012Number)
paramNumber <- list(
  Y2012   = fetchResults(tmpDbResource)[[1]]
  )
tmpDbResource2  <- dbSendQuery(dbConnection, db.sqlite.cfg$query$param2011Number)
paramNumber$Y2011 <- fetchResults(tmpDbResource2)[[1]]
```


```{r "uploadedStats"}
statsRaw <- matrix(
  with(
    paramAggr_df, {
      c(
        sum(parameterNum[year == 2012 & action == "uploadedDate"])
        , sum(parameterNum[year == 2011 & action == "uploadedDate"])
        , sum(parameterNum[year == 2012 & action == "metadatedDate"])
        , sum(parameterNum[year == 2011 & action == "metadatedDate"])
        , paramNumber$Y2012
        , paramNumber$Y2011
        )
      }
    )
  , ncol = 3
  , dimnames = list(
    c("Year2012", "Year2011")
    , c("No. uploaded", "No. metadated", "Total no.")
    )
  )
statsRaw <- addmargins(statsRaw, margin = 1)

statsRaw <- cbind(statsRaw, "Upload ratio" = statsRaw[,"No. uploaded"] / statsRaw[,"Total no."])
statsRaw <- cbind(statsRaw, "Metadata ratio"= statsRaw[,"No. metadated"] / statsRaw[,"Total no."])
```


## State of uploading process

* Last updated ```r as.character(Sys.Date())```
* Deadline for data submission: `2013-03-08`
* Days to deadline: ```r difftime(as.Date("2013-03-08",format="%Y-%m-%d"), Sys.Date(), units = "days")```



* Total number of sites sampled in 2012: ```r siteNumber```; stations: ```r stationNumber```

## Aggregated data by domain

```{r "aggrDataByDomain"}

submissionPlot <- ggplot(paramAggr_df, aes(x = dayOfYear, y = parameterNum, fill = domainName)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  ylab("Daily submissions") +
  xlab("Day of year") +
  ggtitle("A5 data submissions") +
  facet_grid(year~action, scales = "free_y") +
  theme_bw()
suppressWarnings(print(submissionPlot))
```
